title: A declaration of the czaars [sic] of Muscovy against the French King, in favour of the poor Protestants distress in this present persecution obtained for them by the intercession of his Electoral Highness the Marquess of Brandenburg.
author: Russia. Sovereign (1682-1696 : Ivan V)
publisher: printed for E. Maret, and C. Lucas,
notes: The czars of Muscovy = Ivan V and Peter I, co-czars in 1689.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
